name: 氣候學特論
comment: 上課教室：文學院勤9F地理系研討室六。
description: This course describes various physical, radiative, dynamical processes involved in the earth’s climate system. In particular, it will emphasize the importance of climate dynamics in explaining the current research areas such as ENSO dynamics, Arctic oscillation, and effects of global warming on monsoons. In this course, active discussions on some influential journal articles are an important part by which students will acquire updated information regarding various aspects of climate change research.
goals: 能了解當前重要氣候課題
能運用常用的氣候統計分析工具
能分析特定的氣候變異問題
能了解氣候變遷常用的模式工具
